message.name: ERR_RESOURCE_XRV_ORGUNITRESOURCE_EXISTS
message.locale: The resource status cannot be set to closed as it is assigned to an organization unit.
The resource status cannot be set to closed as it is assigned to an organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_RESOURCE_STATUS_CANT_BE_CLOSED_AS_ASSIGNED_TO_LOCATION
message.locale: The resource status cannot be set to closed as it is assigned to a location.

message.name: ERR_RESOURCE_CANT_BE_DELETED_AS_ASSIGNED_TO_LOCATION
message.locale: The resource cannot be deleted as it is assigned to a location.
The resource cannot be deleted as it is assigned to a location.

message.name: ERR_RESOURCE_CANT_BE_DELETED_AS_ASSIGNED_TO_ORGANISATIONUNIT
message.locale: The resource cannot be deleted as it is assigned to an organization unit.
The resource cannot be deleted as it is assigned to an organisation unit.

message.name: ERR_LOCATIONRESOURCE_XRV_DUP
message.locale: This resource has already been assigned to this location.
This resource has already been assigned to this location.
